name: Ditzy Witchy
description:
Ditzy Witchy is an interactive storybook where you guide two friends that are lost at sea.

-: CONTROLS :-
Click your mouse to advance the text and draw lines to cast spells.

-: ABOUT :-
Ditzy Witchy is the fifth monthly game created by Cozy Game Pals. This month's game was made in 48 hours as part of Global Game Jam 2017.

-: CREDITS :-
Writing/Story - Ariel Wok
Art - Crista Castro
Programming - Bryan Singh
